---
title: "get-documents.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines a deprecated function `getDocumentsFromFHIR` that wraps and re-exports the `getDocuments` function from the `@metriport/core` package. It serves as a backward-compatible interface for retrieving FHIR DocumentReference resources.

## Symbols

### `getDocumentsFromFHIR`
#### Description
This is a deprecated asynchronous function that acts as a wrapper for the `getDocuments` function from the `@metriport/core` package. It retrieves FHIR DocumentReference resources based on the provided parameters.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| ...params | Parameters&lt;typeof getDocuments&gt; | Spread of parameters accepted by the `getDocuments` function |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| Promise&lt;DocumentReference[]&gt; | Promise&lt;DocumentReference[]&gt; | A promise that resolves to an array of DocumentReference resources |

#### Internal Logic
The function simply calls the `getDocuments` function with the spread parameters and returns its result.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| @medplum/fhirtypes | Provides the DocumentReference type |
| @metriport/core/external/fhir/document/get-documents | Provides the getDocuments function |

## TODOs
The function is marked as deprecated with a comment suggesting to use `getDocuments()` from `@metriport/core/external/fhir/document/get-documents` instead.
